import React , {Component} from 'react'; import './Current.css'; export default class Current extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { city:'', state:'' } } componentDidMount(){ const [lat, long] = [this.props.weatherinfo.latitude, this.props.weatherinfo.longitude]; const url = `https://api.opencagedata.com/geocode/v1/json?q=${lat}+${long}&key=9c325aa45a2c4f81a72b27674accf9c7` fetch(url) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data=>{ console.log(data.results[0].components.city, data.results[0].components.state) console.log('kossssssssssssssssssss') this.setState({city: data.results[0].components.city, state: data.results[0].components.state}) }) } render(){ return (

{this.state.city}

{this.props.weatherinfo.timezone}

{this.props.weatherinfo.currently.apparentTemperature}°F

{this.props.weatherinfo.currently.summary}
